For Students Information:
 • Fill in Student, Subgroup 1 (Section), and Subgroup 2 (Subject/Quiz).
 • Tap Start Scan or Import Photos to scan answer sheets.
 • Camera: Align the answer sheet and tap Scan. After capture, crop the image to focus on answers, then confirm.
 • Import Photos: Select one or multiple images from gallery for batch processing.
 • A popup will show the parsed answers filtered to your answer key. Tap any value to edit if needed.
 • Tap Confirm & Score to see your score, then tap Save to store it in History.
 • Tap Scan Again to close the popup and return to the camera.
 
 Setup Answer Key:
 • Menu → Setup Answer Key.
 • Use slots to manage multiple quizzes (New/Rename/Delete/Import/Export).
 • Add answers: enter Question # and Answer (A–Z or short text up to 40 chars) → Save.
 • The current key is shown at the bottom; use Clear All to reset if needed.
 
 History & Export:
 • Menu → History: Expand by Quiz and Section to view results. You can rename or delete groups.
 • Menu → Export CSV: Exports results for spreadsheets.
 • Masterlist: View aggregated per-question statistics across all saved records.
 
 Tips:
 • Use good lighting and keep the sheet flat; align edges within the frame.
 • For handwritten sheets: use dark pen, avoid shadows, crop tightly.
 • If nothing is recognized, tap Scan Again and try a steadier shot or adjust brightness.
 • Always review the parsed answers before confirming the score.
